text: Ezɨ gavmanɨn faragha zuir gumaziba ko, gumazir dapaniba ko, gumazir aruar faragh zuiba ko, gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba atrivim ganɨdiba, me iza Judan gumazir 3plan kabar ganasa uari akufa. Me gara fo, me isizir puvatɨ. Egha avim men dapanir arɨziba ko korotiabar isizir puvatɨ, egha me mɨkarzitam isigha mughazir puvatɨ, egha avir mughuriar tam zuir puvatɨ.
